contentfulSermon.title: Backstage Pass to Christmas: Week 5 - The Real Spirit of Christmas

image.title: Backstage Pass to Christmas Sermon Series

fields.notesFormatted:
Don't miss Christmas like...

...the innkeeper who was indifferent.

...King Herod who felt threatened.

...the religious elite who were self-righteous.

Find Christmas like...

...the shepherds who accept the invitation. ...the wise men who keep seeking.

The Real Spirit of Christmas

Mark 2:16-17, Romans 5:8-10, 2 Corinthians 5:17-21
